title: I made a champion
body: Iâ€™m thinking a deranged cursed pizza monster chef named Dommio, he was a famous pizza chef until (incoming ridiculousness) he used dark magic to make people love his food. It slowly corrupted him until he became a living pizza monster (description: giant slice of pizza with a huge pizza cutter arm, a classic Italian chef outfit, a cooking satchel, and 1 leg being a dough roller). His attacks consist of crowd control/being a tank/giving positive effects.

replies.body: Make more food-themed champs for us please.
How hungry were you when making this???
Not outside the lol realm of possibility if you think about it
